text: On ðon seofonteoðan dæg ðæs monðes martii bið sancte Patrices tyd ðæs halgan bisceopes se gelærde ða mægðe to geleafan Hiebernia, þæt is scotta mægð.
His fæder nama wæs Calpurne & his modor nama wæs conta blata.
& he sylf wæs on hundteontigum geara & on an & ðrytegum ða he his gast ageaf.
& ær ðam ðe he come on scotta mægðe ða cyld clypedon & cwædon cum sancte Patrice & gehæle us ec.
